body.section: Hierarchy ObservationRequest is a kind of HealthcareOrder

section.title: Description
section.p: This class contains informatin associated with the record of a request that certain observation(s) be performed. This class can be used for Vital Signs, Laboratory, Radiology, or other types of observations.

stentry.p: An administration schedule for how often the requested observation should be performed.
Identifies a kind of vital sign observation that can be, is, or has been requested as part of an order.
